about.subtitle: Your destination for modern digital greetings
about.description: HappySend was created with a simple goal: to bring the joy of sending and receiving cards into the digital age. We combine modern technology with the timeless feeling of a personal greeting.
about.mission_desc: We want to make it easier and more magical to show you care, regardless of distance.
about.creator_desc: HappySend is developed with ❤️ to create small moments of joy in everyday life.

v1_3_0.desc: Added option to add a profile picture to your account. and fix some ui issues on mobile devices. and Added a share button to the card.

v1_2_0.desc: New card designs added! Choose from several unique styles to make your greeting even more special. Added time lock feature on cards. Performance improvements. Added email login option.

v1_1_0.desc: Official PWA Support! Install HappySend on your phone. Plus: Enhanced envelope design & draft saving.

v1_0_0.desc: The big HappySend upgrade! New 3D design, ultra-fast links, and Next.js 16.
